creditline: Gift of Ruth and Bruce Dayton
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: Red lacquer panel, carved and inlaid with gold; compartmentalized top with organic repeating designs around edges; central section with vessel at center sprouting long, curling stems with four cushionlike flowers which support various unindentified objects
markings: Untranslated inscriptions, on back, inside an organic design element
object_name: Sutra Cover, one of a pair
title: Sutra Cover, one of a pair
